p: Lastly, an uncommon study was undertaken by Chitsazan in 2015 [ 3] to prove the anti-cancer properties of four type catechins of green tea (epicatechin; epigallocatechin; epicatechin-3-gallate and EGCG) via quantum mechanics calculations, namely ab initio method. The author also proposed a relation between the biological activity and the chemical structure of the catechins.
